extension.description: This add-on covers both the audio and video sections of The Internet Archive, AKA archive.org. [CR]The Internet Archive is a 501(c)(3) non-profit that was founded to build an Internet library. Its purposes include offering permanent access for researchers, historians, scholars, people with disabilities, and the general public to historical collections that exist in digital format.
